events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application seeking funds to cover upcoming medical expenses. They expressed hope for a swift approval process.
The application was reviewed and correctly categorised under personal loans due to the stated purpose of medical bills coverage.
A loan officer was assigned to manage the application and serve as the point of contact for the applicant moving forward.
An initial review of the application documents and stated purposes was conducted to verify eligibility and loan suitability.
The loan officer requested additional medical bills and proof of income to support the personal loan application.
Applicant submitted requested medical bills and recent pay stubs to fulfill verification requirements promptly.
Completed credit check revealed a stable credit history with a few months of recent on-time payments despite past minor delays.
Risk assessment indicated the applicant has moderate risk due to prior payment delays but overall manageable repayment capacity.
An offer was presented to the applicant detailing loan amount, interest rates, and repayment terms that align with their needs and credit profile.
Applicant provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the loan offer and requested clarification on a few repayment schedule details.
The application was escalated to the underwriting team for final review of repayment capability and medical expense verification.
Loan officially approved following underwriting review, confirming the applicantâ€™s ability to repay and the legitimacy of medical expenses.
Funds were disbursed to the applicant's designated bank account to cover the medical bills as requested in the loan application.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant received the funds and to remind them of upcoming repayment deadlines.
The loan application case was officially closed after ensuring all funding and documentation were completed satisfactorily.
